items.title: External Task Integration: Database Schema
items.notes: Created 4 tables (integration_providers, integration_credentials, project_integrations, task_external_links) via migration d4e5f6a7b8c9. Added INTEGRATION_ENCRYPTION_KEY to .env.

items.title: External Task Integration: Provider Infrastructure
items.notes: Created integrations/ module with encryption.py (Fernet), providers/base.py (abstract TaskIntegrationProvider), and provider registry.

items.title: External Task Integration: Asana Provider
items.notes: Implemented AsanaProvider with PAT auth, pagination, list_projects, list_tasks, get_task with subtasks/attachments, and bidirectional sync methods.

items.title: External Task Integration: API Endpoints
items.notes: Added 8 endpoints to main.py: credential CRUD, project mapping, external project/task listing, and task import.

items.title: External Task Integration: UI Wizard
items.notes: Created static/js/integrations.js and static/css/integrations.css. Added 5-step import wizard modal to chat.html.

items.title: External Task Integration: Tests
items.notes: Created tests/test_integrations.py with 22 tests covering encryption, provider base, Asana provider (mocked), and models. 14 passed, 8 skipped (API tests need langchain).

items.title: Implement Jira Provider
items.notes: Extend TaskIntegrationProvider for Jira REST API (API token + email auth).

items.title: Implement Linear Provider
items.notes: Extend TaskIntegrationProvider for Linear GraphQL API.

items.title: Implement GitHub Issues Provider
items.notes: Extend TaskIntegrationProvider for GitHub Issues API (PAT auth, labels to nodes mapping).

items.title: Bidirectional Sync Job
items.notes: Periodic job to push status changes back to external providers using update_task_status().
